text: Kamaghɨra, Iesus uaghan nguibar ekiamɨn azenan mɨzazim ini. A ghaze, a uan ghuzimɨn gumazamizibar amightɨ me Godɨn damazimɨn zuegh egh Godɨn gumazamizibar otivigham, kamaghɨn an areme.(13:12) Moses Osirizir Araziba ghaze, gumazamiziba Godɨn ofa damuasa inigha izir asɨziba, ofa gamir gumaziba da api. Me asɨzir gumazamizibar arazir kuraba gɨn amangsɨ, dughiar ekiabar ofa gamiba, me dar aman kogham. Nɨ Wok Pris 6:24 ko 24:30 ko 16:27ɨn gan. Datɨrɨghɨn, ofan dughiar ekiar kam, Iesus amizir ofan kam an danganim ini. Nɨ Hibru 9:7, 14ɨn gan.
